problem_text_cn: 如图,在一个平行四边形中,两对平行于边的直线将这个平行四边形分为九个小平行四边形,如果原来这个平行四边形的面积为100cm²,而中间那个小平行四边形(阴影部分)的面积为20平方厘米,则四边形ABDC的面积是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in a parallelogram, two pairs of straight lines parallel to the edges bisect the parallelogram into nine small parallelograms. If the area of ​​the original parallelogram is N_0 ^ 2, and the small parallelogram in the middle (shaded part) The area of ​​is N_1 square centimeters, then the area of ​​the quadrilateral ABDC is ()
raw_answer: 解:四边形ABDC的面积=①+③+⑥+⑦+阴影部分的面积,四边形ABDC内空白部分的面积是:(100-20)÷2=80÷2=40(cm²)；四边形ABDC的面积:40+20=60(cm²)．∴四边形ABDC的面积是60cm²．故选:B．
